basics.name: Maksym Dovhan
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Software Engineer with over 4 years of expertise in .NET Core backend development. Bachelor's in Computer Science. Skilled in scalable application design, API development, and performance optimization. Strong communicator and problem solver. Passionate about impactful software solutions.

work.name: GlobalLogic
work.summary: Worked on multiple projects in the media streaming and industrial domains. Involved in migration, backend development, and software portal design.
highlights: Supported and developed OTT music app (Roku, BrightScript).
Migrated legacy systems to Python, Django, .NET Core.
Developed OTA software update portal using .NET Core and C#.

work.name: iOL
work.summary: Back-end developer of web applications in Fin-tech & Direct Bookings areas. Focused on integrations, support, and high-load systems.

projects.name: Sudoku+
projects.description: Mobile game for Android with a real-time multiplayer Sudoku puzzle mode. Full-stack implementation.

projects.name: Cellular Automaton PRNG
projects.description: Code library implementing a PRNG algorithm based on 1D cellular automaton. Passed NIST SP 800-22 test suite.
